Verses: 1 devanudaiya Kirubaiyai Neengal Virudhaavaaip Peraadhapadikku, Udanvelaiyaatkalaagiya Naangal Ungalukkup Buththisollugirom.
2 anukkiraga Kaalaththile Naan Unakku Sevikoduththu, Ratchaniyanaalile Unakku Udhaviseydhen Endru Solliyirukkiraare; Idho, Ippozhudhe Anukkiragakaalam, Ippozhudhe Ratchaniya Naal.
3 indha Oozhiyam Kutrappadaadhapadikku, Naangal Yaadhondrilum Idaral Undaakkaamal, Evvidhaththinaaleyum, Engalai Dhevaoozhiyakkaararaaga Vilangappannugirom.
5 adigalilum, Kaavalgalilum, Kalakangalilum. Pirayaasangalilum, Kanvizhippugalilum, Ubavaasangalilum,
6 karpilum, Arivilum, Neediya Saandhaththilum, Thayavilum, Parisuththa Aaviyilum, Maayamatra Anbilum,
7 saththiyavasanaththilum, Divviya Balaththilum; Needhiyaagiya Valathidadhupakkaththu Aayudhangalaith Thariththirukkiradhilum,
8 ganaththilum, Ganaveenaththilum, Thurkkeerththiyilum, Narkeerththiyilum; Eththarennappattaalum Nijasdharaagavum,
9 ariyappadaadhavargalennappattaalum Nandraai Ariyappattavargalaagavum, Saagiravargal Ennappattaalum Uyirodirukkiravargalaagavum, Thandikkappadugiravargal Ennappattaalum Kollappadaadhavargalaagavum,

10 thukkappadugiravargal Ennappattaalum Eppozhudhum Sandhoshappadugiravargalaagavum, Thariththirar Ennappattaalum Anegarai Aisuvariyavaangalaakkugiravargalaagavum, Ondrumillaadhavargalennappattaalum Sagalaththaiyumudaiyavargalaagavum Engalai Vilangappannugirom.
11 korindhiyare, Engal Vaai Ungalode Pesath Thirandhirukkiradhu, Engal Irudhayam Pooriththirukkiradhu.
12 engal Ullam Ungalaikkuriththu Nerukkamadaiyavillai Ungal Ullame Engalaikkuriththu Nerukkamadaindhirukkiradhu.
13 aadhalaal Adharkup Badhileedaaga Neengalum Poorippaagungalendru, Pillaigalukku Sollugiradhupola, Ungalukkusollugiren.
14 anniya Nugaththile Avisuvaasigaludan Pinaikkappadaadhiruppeergalaaga; Needhikkum Aneedhikkum Sambandhamedhu? Olikkum Irulukkum Aikkiyamedhu?
15 kiristhuvukkum Peliyaalukkum Isaivedhu? Avisuvaasiyudane Visuvaasikkup Pangedhu?

16 dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukkum Vikkiragangalukkum Sambandhamedhu? Naan Avargalukkulle Vaasampanni, Avargalukkulle Ulaavi Avargal Dhevanaayiruppen, Avargal En Janangalaayiruppaargal Endru, Dhevan Sonnapadi, Neengal Jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Aalayamaayirukkireergale.
17 aanapadiyaal, Neengal Avargal Naduvilirundhu Purappattup Pirindhupoi, Asuththamaanavaigalaith Thodaadhirungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
18 appodhu, Naan Ungalai Etrukkondu, Ungalukkup Pidhaavaayiruppen, Neengal Enakkuk Kumaararum Kumaaraththigalumaayiruppeergalendru Sarvavallamaiyulla Karththarsollugiraar.
